desc: SOL Hair & Beauty is a proudly Sri Lankan owned and operated company and has quickly established itself as one of Sri Lankas leading Hair & Beauty wholesalers.

layout.text: Jeval® Haircare extends the ethos of Jeval®
THE MASTER OF STYLE HAS ARRIVED
Gentle on scalp and hair, while delivering superior results.
SOL is dedicated to providing you with a superior level of customer service.
As your Salon partner we will be able to assist you with questions or product information.
